attributes.action: Petition for The Football Association (FA) to be reformed.
attributes.additional_details: Petition for The Football Association (FA) to be reformed to include structural changes and changes to the way that the chairman and board of directors are selected so that we the public can vote for a number of different candidates to become the chairman who best represents the changes that we as the public want to see happen in football, or who best represents the public’s views on football. The elected chairman would then choose his/hers board of directors to help implement said chairman’s policies. An election would be held every four years.
